alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Brown; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:11PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Nicollet, Brown and Blue Earth Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At New Ulm. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 799.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 805.2 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 800.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 806.0 feet on 04/05/2011. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
